name: GAS Roguelite Arena
description:
This project is a Tech Demo / Proof of Concept / Learning Practice for Unreal Engine's Gameplay Ability System.

Controls Keyboard Gamepad Movement WASD Left Stick Aiming Mouse Right Stick Attacking Left Mouse Right Trigger Dashing Spacebar B Button (⬗) Glitch the game ??? A Button (⬙) Why is there a "glitch the game" button?!

A bug happened at the last minute when adding CommonUI. No idea why this happens :(

Things used / covered in this demo
  • Common UI
    • Plataform specific button prompts
  • GAS (Melee, ranged, dash, base attributes + derived attributes)
    • Melee and ranged attacks, dash,
    • Base attributes + Derived attributes
    • Everything is network compatible
  • See through walls shader
  • Plastic shader
  • Faux transparency with Dither node
  • Flopping banners with wind node
  • Randomizing bookcase blueprint
  • Soft References
  • Savedata
Things out of scope
  • Sound
  • Proper multiplayer
3D Models by Kay https://kaylousberg.itch.io/ UI Assets by Wyrmheart https://opengameart.org/content/rpg-game-ui
